docs.snippet: ELIN--Marilyn (nee Menschel), age 96, on May 31, 2015. Loving wife of the late Howard F. Elin, sons Charles (Miriam) and Mark (Jeanne). Adoring grandmother of Stephen, Rachel, Jessica, Andrew, Michael and Daniel. Devoted sister of the late Muriel ...
docs.lead_paragraph: ELIN--Marilyn (nee Menschel), age 96, on May 31, 2015. Loving wife of the late Howard F. Elin, sons Charles (Miriam) and Mark (Jeanne). Adoring grandmother of Stephen, Rachel, Jessica, Andrew, Michael and Daniel. Devoted sister of the late Muriel Loeb and Eleanor Snyder. Generous spirit. Favorite quote: "Old age ain't for sissies." Contributions can be made to Hospice of Palm Beach County or Seeds of Peace.

docs.snippet: EDELSTEIN--Charles, on May 30, 2015. Beloved husband of the late Celia, devoted father of Bernice Edelstein Fingeret (Donald) and Walter Edelstein (Brooke), loving grandfather of Cori, Casey, David and Georgie. He will remain in our hearts forever...
docs.lead_paragraph:
EDELSTEIN--Charles,

on May 30, 2015. Beloved husband of the late Celia, devoted father of Bernice Edelstein Fingeret (Donald) and Walter Edelstein (Brooke), loving grandfather of Cori, Casey, David and Georgie. He will remain in our hearts forever. Donations in his honor may be made to Alpha Omega Foundation, Holocaust Dental Program, 50 W. Edmonston Dr., Suite 206, Rockville, MD 20852.

docs.snippet: LEHRER--Devorah, 88, of West Hartford, CT passed away in her home June 2, 2015. The daughter of Sam and Sarah Miller of Brooklyn, NY. wed Morton Lehrer in 1947. Their 59 years together prior to Morton's passing in 2007, was dedicated to family and...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEHRER--Devorah, 88, of West Hartford, CT passed away in her home June 2, 2015. The daughter of Sam and Sarah Miller of Brooklyn, NY. wed Morton Lehrer in 1947. Their 59 years together prior to Morton's passing in 2007, was dedicated to family and community. Devorah was an active member of youth and religious organizations during their years in Rockville Centre, NY. Her widowed life found her enjoying friends and staff at Hoffman Summerwood Senior Community in West Hartford, CT. She is survived by Allan and Sherry Lehrer of Avon, CT., Barry and Ilyse Lehrer of Merrick, NY, Eliot and Lynne Godofsky of Sarasota, Fl., and lovingly missed by eight grand children. Funeral will take place at Guttermans Chapel, Rockville Centre, NY on Sunday, June 7th at 11am. Interment at New Montifiore Cemetery. In lieu of gifts and flowers donations can be made to the Solomon Schechter Day School of Greater Hartford Endowment Fund, 26 Buena Vista Road, West Hartford, CT 06107.

docs.snippet: THOMAS--Richard L., of Tewksbury, NJ passed away on April 29th, 2015. He was born in Stamford, TX in 1947. He is survived by his wife, Susan and a brother, William of Ohio. He combined his love of vintage auto racing, sailing and fishing with a ca...
docs.lead_paragraph:
THOMAS--Richard L.,

of Tewksbury, NJ passed away on April 29th, 2015. He was born in Stamford, TX in 1947. He is survived by his wife, Susan and a brother, William of Ohio. He combined his love of vintage auto racing, sailing and fishing with a career of more than 30 years of insurance underwriting, most recently with Starr Companies of New York. Donations of remembrance may be sent to Andrea Morris, Assistant Dean, College of Computer, Mathematical and Natural Sciences, University of Maryland, 2320 Symons Hall, College Park, MD 20742. A private celebration of his life was held for friends and family.
